name: sort-generator
description: Sorting on multiple criteria with generator functions

scripts.test: npm run prepare && nyc --exclude-after-remap false --exclude build/test/ multi-tape -o -p 4 build/test/test-*.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run prepare && nyc --exclude-after-remap false --exclude build/test/ --reporter lcov multi-tape -o -p 4 build/test/test-*.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Mattias Holmlund <mattias@holmlund.se>
